lakunu thaththwaya wuye 26 – 24, 25 – 21 ha 25 – 19 ki.badmintan awasan purwa tharaga paradimishra yugala badmintan awasan purwa tharagayedi shashri lankawa niyojanaya kala renu chandrika ha niluka karunarathna 2 – 0 kin indiyawe aparna balan ha sanew thomasta parajaya wiya.kantha eekala awasan purwa tharagayedi shri lankawa niyojanaya kala thilini jayasinha 2 – 0 kin indiyawe thirupathi murugundeta parajaya wuwaya.pirimi eekala awasan purwa tharagayedi dinuka karunarathna 2 – 0 kin indiyawe chethan aanandata parajaya wiya.kantha yugala awasan purwa tharagayedi renu chandrika ha nadisha gayanthika 2 – 0 kin indiyawe thulsiya ha ashwini ponnappata parajaya wuha.pirimi yugala awasan purwa tharagayedi ee ha samana prathipalayakin rajitha dahanayaka ha hasitha chanaka indiya kridakayan hamuwe parajaya wuha.achini rathnasiri ha upuli samandrika da 2 – 0 kin awasan purwa tharagayedi indiyawata parajaya wuha.

thawaduratath apa ratata nowadagath bawata janawari 08 wani da bahuthara shri lankikayan wisin thindu karana lada ‘parajitha mahinda sadhakaya‘ oonawata wada barapathaleta ganimin thama wenuwen labunu purawasi thinduwa pawa itha ninditha thaththwayakata ada damimata janadhipathiwaraya meheyawana laddeda deshapalanika pakshawalata apa samajaya thula himi wi athi anawashya wadagathkamayi. 1948 n pasuwa me dakwama merata janathawa podu nambauruwak dakwa aththeda sama mohothakama kawara ho deshapalanika pakshayak samaga aandi sitimatayi.

sanwardhana yugaya polisye ha hamudawe balawath uthsahayen siyalla eli peheli kara nalalin mangin jalaya jayawikrama perera mathithuma da jenaretarayak mangin widuliya karu jayasuriya mathindun da mulwi labadun athara sesu siyalu sanwardhana katayuthu sadahawathunge aadhara athiwa uktha aayathana mulwi sidu kirimata patan gani. 2005 di ganwathuren da winashayata path wu awasthawaka mahinda rajapaksha agamathithuman pamina yuda hamudawa mangin da pramanawath aarakshawa laba di sanghawasayata da mulgal thaba sthira sanwardhana katayuthu aarambha kirimata hakiwiya.

katholika piyathumaku lesa wadima guwanwiduli wadasatahan sankhyawak kirima saha rupawahini madiri thulath elimahaneth wadasatahan meheyawima gana sihin aadambarayakuth hithata danenawa. 1982 shri lanka katholika sinama parshadaye adhyaksha wimath samanga boho denaku samanga sinama kalawa pilibandawath, pasuwa rupawahiniya pilibandawath awabodhaya labamin apata kala haki sewaya ee mangin itu karanna awasthawa labuna.
